else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“tourn”))
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
else
{
teleportToX = 2868;
teleportToY = 3591;
sendMessage(“your going to die you NARB!=[).”);
} then when i rebooted my server nothing happend when i typed ::tourn and there was no tab for it. so if someone could tell me how to make a tab of it it would be much appreaceated .lol.
